Report design to reproduce

I failed reproduced this bug. Your attached report will generate many dataes and when I tried to preview it, the out of memery exception will be thrown. so I have to add a condition in query to reduce the data.

the attached report is my report, which generates less dataes than your report does. I exported it to excel, it works fine.

Created an attachment (id=67643)
my demo report

you can export the attached report with excel format
I'm having an Excel emitter NullPointerException with RC3.  I can export to other formats, HTML, PDF, WORD.  The NPE occurs for multiple reports.  The following is the exception.  

Should I open another issue or attach to this issue?
